name: firecoin
description: Firecoin is a digital asset inspired by the concept of the eternal flame, representing energy, resilience, and guidance. It is designed to act as a decentralized token that embodies light and strength, giving holders a sense of empowerment in the digital economy. The projectâ€™s purpose is to create a community-driven ecosystem where Firecoin symbolizes progress, illumination, and the ability to move forward regardless of challenges. By leveraging blockchain technology, Firecoin aims to provide transparency, security, and accessibility to its users while maintaining its thematic connection to the symbolic power of fire.
